original_title: Никто не знает, где живет Валерик
overview: This is a story about a hunter named Valerik, who lives in a small Siberian village. He spends the whole winter in the forest with his dog Scythian, getting furs to feed his family. Valerik takes pictures of himself with a small digital pocket camera, so that later he can share his hunting adventures with his beloved wife Zina. He feels like the master of nature, but the forest in the form of a bear, follows in the footsteps of Valerik.
title: No One Knows Where Valerik Lives
